templates.name: Anime Portrait Style
templates.description: Transform your photos into beautiful anime-style portraits with vibrant colors and expressive features
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into a beautiful anime-style portrait with vibrant saturated colors, large expressive eyes with detailed highlights, soft cel-shading technique, clean line art, modern anime aesthetic (2020s style), smooth skin with subtle blush, detailed hair with dynamic flow, professional anime character art quality, high resolution
templates.negativePrompt: realistic photo, 3D render, western cartoon, low quality, blurry, distorted face, bad anatomy, extra limbs, watermark, signature, text

templates.name: Cyberpunk Neon City
templates.description: Add futuristic cyberpunk aesthetic with neon lights and urban atmosphere
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into a cyberpunk neon city scene with futuristic urban environment, vibrant neon lights in purple blue and pink, rainy reflective streets, holographic advertisements, high-tech dystopian atmosphere, Blade Runner aesthetic, 4K ultra-detailed, cinematic lighting with dramatic shadows, cyberpunk 2077 style
templates.negativePrompt: bright daylight, natural colors, rustic, vintage, low quality, blurry, cartoon, anime

templates.name: Watercolor Fantasy Art
templates.description: Soft watercolor painting style with dreamy fantasy elements
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into a soft watercolor painting with dreamy fantasy elements, pastel color palette, flowing watercolor textures with visible brush strokes, ethereal atmosphere, magical particles and sparkles, soft edges and blending, paper texture visible, artistic watercolor painting style, delicate and whimsical
templates.negativePrompt: sharp edges, digital art, photorealistic, dark colors, harsh lines, low quality, blurry

templates.name: Hyper-Realistic Portrait Pro
templates.description: Professional photo-realistic portraits with studio lighting and perfect details
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into a hyper-realistic professional portrait with studio lighting setup, perfect skin detail and texture, professional photography quality, bokeh background, dramatic lighting with soft shadows, sharp focus on subject, 85mm lens aesthetic, high-end retouching, magazine cover quality, 8K resolution
templates.negativePrompt: cartoon, anime, painting, artificial, fake, low quality, blurry, overexposed, underexposed, noise

templates.name: Classic Oil Painting
templates.description: Traditional oil painting style reminiscent of Renaissance masters
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into a classical oil painting with Renaissance master style (Rembrandt, Vermeer technique), rich warm color palette with golden tones, visible thick brushstrokes and impasto texture, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, museum-quality fine art, realistic portrait with depth and dimension, subtle craquelure aging effect, traditional canvas texture
templates.negativePrompt: modern, digital, cartoon, anime, flat colors, photograph, low quality, simple

templates.name: Retro Pixel Art
templates.description: 8-bit and 16-bit pixel art style perfect for retro gaming aesthetics
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into retro pixel art with 8-bit and 16-bit style, limited color palette, visible square pixels, retro gaming aesthetic, nostalgic 90s video game graphics, dithering technique, clean pixel lines, sharp edges, Game Boy and NES style, retro gaming character sprite quality
templates.negativePrompt: smooth gradients, photorealistic, modern 3D, blurry, high resolution detail, watercolor

templates.name: Epic Fantasy Landscape
templates.description: Breathtaking fantasy landscapes with magical elements and dramatic lighting
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into an epic fantasy landscape with breathtaking magical scenery, dramatic volumetric lighting with god rays, mystical atmosphere with floating particles, grand scale with mountains and castles, fantasy game concept art style, vibrant magical colors, detailed environment, cinematic composition, Lord of the Rings aesthetic, 4K detailed fantasy illustration
templates.negativePrompt: modern city, realistic photo, simple, plain, low quality, blurry, cartoon style

templates.name: Minimalist Modern Art
templates.description: Clean minimalist style with modern geometric shapes and limited color palette
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into minimalist modern art with clean geometric shapes, limited color palette (2-3 colors), simple composition with negative space, flat design aesthetic, contemporary art gallery style, abstract geometric forms, smooth gradients, professional graphic design quality, Bauhaus influence
templates.negativePrompt: complex details, realistic, cluttered, ornate, textured, photographic, low quality

templates.name: Steampunk Vintage Style
templates.description: Victorian-era steampunk aesthetic with brass gears and mechanical elements
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into steampunk vintage style with Victorian-era aesthetic, brass and copper mechanical elements with gears and cogs, steam-powered machinery details, sepia and warm brown color tones, intricate clockwork mechanisms, industrial revolution atmosphere, leather and metal textures, aged vintage look with scratches, detailed mechanical illustration
templates.negativePrompt: modern, futuristic, clean, digital, bright colors, minimal, low quality, simple

templates.name: Abstract Colorful Expression
templates.description: Vibrant abstract art with bold colors and expressive brush strokes

templates.name: Comic Book Hero Style
templates.description: Classic comic book art style with bold lines and vivid colors

templates.name: Gothic Dark Art
templates.description: Dark gothic atmosphere with mysterious and dramatic elements

templates.name: Impressionist Painting
templates.description: Soft impressionist style with loose brushwork and emphasis on light
templates.prompt: Transform this photo into impressionist painting style with loose visible brushwork, emphasis on natural light and its changing qualities, soft color palette with pastels, outdoor plein air aesthetic, Monet and Renoir style, capturing the impression of a moment, dappled light effects, atmospheric perspective, canvas texture visible
